content: look for easy chunky afghan for babies on website this chunky crochet blanket pattern makes a perfect timeless baby gift but once you feel how soft it is there s no way you won t want to make one for yourself too the pattern explains how to make larger sizes and it works up super quickly in bernat blanket yarn it s chunky it s delicate it s modern it s classic what more could you ask for in an afghan oh yes--it also feels like it s made of clouds
